name: Auto: Water and Justice
description: When the Round ends: Heal the character on your team who has taken the most DMG for 5 HP, then split HP equally between all your allies.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Round ends:</color> Heal the character on your team who has taken the most DMG for 5 HP, then split HP equally between all your allies.
